column21: Only improvements to existing structures are allowed in the floodway. Building in Special Flood Hazard areas is permitted as long as the lowest floor, including basement, is elevated to at least 1 ft above base flood elevation. Manufactured homes must be placed on a permanent foundation so the lowest floor is elevated to 1 ft above base flood elevation; if this is not possible, the lowest floor must be supported by reinforced piers or similar material at least 48 inches in height.
